globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'nonce-bootstrap' 'nonce-repowidget' 'nonce-tradingview' 'nonce-theme' https://repowidget.vercel.app https://s3.tradingview.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'nonce-bootstrap' 'nonce-critical-css' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; connect-src 'self' https://api.github.com https://repowidget.vercel.app https://s3.tradingview.com; frame-src https://s3.tradingview.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests; block-all-mixed-content
globalHeaders.Permissions-Policy: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=(), usb=(), interest-cohort=(), browsing-topics=()
